doc.field: Board of Trustees of the Brooklyn Fire Department meeting minutes
Board of Trustees of the Brooklyn Fire Department meeting minutes

The Board of Trustees of the Brooklyn Fire Department meeting minutes list the members and officers of the board for each year and record votes taken and motions passed at each meeting between 1848 and 1854.

The Board of Trustees of the Brooklyn Fire Department meeting minutes list the members and officers of the board for each year and record votes taken and motions passed at each meeting between 1848 and 1854.

The Board of Trustees of the Brooklyn Fire Department meeting minutes span the period 1848 to 1854 and are housed in a single hardbound volume. The minutes list the members and officers of the board for each year and record votes taken and motions passed at each meeting. Topics discussed at the meetings most often included financial transactions and ammendments to the constitution and bylaws of the board.
Source and date of acquisition uknown. The item was formally accessioned in 1977.
